title: Real Simple Oversized Laundry Hamper at Bed Bath & Beyond

This oversized laundry hamper can hold up to 50 lbs. of laundry and features a heavy duty chrome frame and 4 caster wheels with 2 step locks

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/Real-Simple-reg-Oversized-Laundry-Hamper/1041617496?Keyword=41617496
This oversized laundry hamper can hold up to 50 lbs. of laundry and features a heavy duty chrome frame and 4 caster wheels with 2 step locks for easy transport to and from the laundry room. Hamper also has a convenient divider for easy sorting. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Oversized laundry hamper by real simple was designed exclusively for bed bath and beyond. This laundry solution is easy to put together and keeps your closed organized until you're ready to do laundry. To assemble, First lay out all the pieces in front of you. The pieces are labeled a through k start assembling the top of the hamper frame by first establishing pieces. B, D and both G's. Both frame pieces have a push button that lock into place when the frame pieces are inserted into the plastic G Pieces. The G pieces have an inner tube and an outer tube. Each tube has a hole in it that locks the frames into place once they are inserted into the part. Take one of the G pieces and holding it so that the two locking holes are facing down and insert D into the inner tube. Inserting by pushing the push button on the frame. When the tube is securely in place the push button will pop out of the locking hole. Once that side of D is securely in place take the other G piece and insert the other side of D into the inner tube. Now take frame piece E. The larger frame piece and insert each end into the outer tubing on each of the G pieces. The top of the sorter is now complete. Next you will need the four A pieces that will be used as the hammer base I've turned the frame upside down. Insert the straight end, not the curved end into the G pieces. Now that all the A pieces are inserted into the G pieces. Align all the A pieces so the curving end is curving to the inside of the hamper. Next find the pieces labelled B and C and the hardware bag labeled IJ. Notice that C is slightly longer than the B. Part C attaches to the outer legs and part B attaches to the inner legs. Using the screws, screw each piece on to the base. Use the Allen wrench to tighten the screw and make sure they're secure. We're almost done. Let's just add the wheels. There are four wheels in total. two wheels that lock and two wheels that cannot be locked. You can identify the locking wheel as they have a metal lever on them. Attach the locking wheels to the same side of the base. Then attach the non locking wheels to the other side of the base. Manually screw on the wheels and then use the wrench that's provided, to tighten them properly. Now you're ready to attach the fabric sorter. Simply wrap the fabric around the bars. And press the Velcro together. This oversized laundry hamper, has a removable divider in the center, allowing you to have two compartments or one large compartment. The oversize laundry hamper is available exclusively online and at select bed bath and beyond stores.
